segments.text: Hey , you have been promoted to president of the department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All this is thanks to the efforts of my superiors and colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so smart . Your efforts in the success of the plan were outstanding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just did what I should have done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ Ve got a great personality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliments . I will try even harder to repay the company and your support .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you will . I ’ m very pleased with your work . Your promotion will contribute to the development of the company .
segments.speaker: S1
